item.title: iRacing Renews Ty Majeski Sponsorship for 2016
item.description:
iRacing Renews Ty Majeski Sponsorship for 2016

iRacing.com announced today it has renewed its sponsorship partnership with two time ARCA Midwest Tour champion Ty Majeski for 2016. The highest rated driver on iRacing's online motorsports simulation service, Majeski is coming-off a 2015 season in which he captured his second straight ARCA Midwest Tour title and was named Kulwicki Driver Development Program Champion.

item.title: The seasons end and Half Life 3 confirmed....
item.description:
The seasons end and Half Life 3 confirmed....

This is always kind of a depressing time of the year for me because winter is literally only weeks away and all the real world racing series are finishing up their seasons. I am excited though to be heading to Homestead on Friday to celebrate our NASCAR Peak Antifreeze Series champion Kenny Humpe and get to watch what is really the only race left in the season.
